0.4.name: wordpress/wp-socialcount
0.4.description: WP-SocialCount is a Wordpress plugin that displays the number of adds/saves from within a social network for any particular URL. Since this plugin allows you to specify the URL that you want to pull the data for, it means that you can display any social number for any URL of your choosing. We also attach no style to the data the plugin returns - so you are free to style and use the data in any way you see fit. Supported so far: Digg, YouTube and Del.icio.us.
